700630f-a.title: Bronx: Bronx Park - Boston Road
700630f-a.text:
Bronx Park: A view of an old house and the Peter Loorillard stable (left) on the south side of Boston Road between the Bronx River and Bronx Park East in the village of Bronxdale. Bronxdale is at this date (1938) a part of Bronx Park, the village having been incorporated into the park in about 1911. Randall Comfort states that the Lorillard stable was moved to the above location from the Lorillard estate which was located along the Bronx Hiver.
1906
Randall Comfort
700630f-a.folder: Bronx Park & Boston Road, Bronx, NY
